title: Comparative Experimental Pedagogy Study for Online Public Speaking Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: An online public speaking training course designed to enhance mathematics presentation skills

learning_goals: Learners can perform math topic presentations in an online environment under at least three of six experimental conditions (video feedback/peer review/real-time coaching, etc.)
Learners can apply verbal and nonverbal communication skills with over 80% accuracy during public speaking
Learners can improve presentation materials at least twice based on peer and instructor feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
